ðŸ“– Summary: Win11Debloat is a PowerShell script designed to simplify the process of decluttering and optimizing Windows 10 and 11. It removes pre-installed bloatware, disables telemetry, and removes intrusive interface elements. The script also offers advanced features for system administrators, such as Windows Audit mode support and the ability to make changes to other user accounts.
